flawed_nl_solution:
Her son has 3 teachers and her daughter has 4, so together they have 3+4 = <<3+4=10>>10 teachers
Harper has already spent $70 on 10 gifts, so she spent $70/10 = $<<70/10=7>>7 per gift
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
